headline: What Nasdaq (NDAQ)'s Tokenized Stock Push and Note Tender Offers Mean For Shareholders
summary: Earlier this month, Nasdaq, Inc. launched cash tender offers of up to US$95,000,000 for select outstanding notes and advanced plans with the SEC to introduce tokenized stocks that mirror traditional shareholder rights within existing market structures. This push into tokenized securities marks a meaningful shift in Nasdaq’s market infrastructure ambitions, emphasizing efficiency gains and alignment with broader institutional interest in asset tokenization. Next, we’ll examine how Nasdaq’s...

headline: Nasdaq Digital Asset Chief Says Exchange Intends To 'Move As Quickly As Possible' To Offer Tokenized Stocks
summary: Nasdaq (NASDAQ:NDAQ) wants to “move as quickly as possible” on tokenized stocks, according to the exchange operator’s head of digital assets strategy. “I think we have to really evaluate where the public comments come back in and then answer and ...
